snippet: Mitt Romney, kicking off a five-day bus tour of small-town America, could not avoid commenting on the new White House policy affecting some young illegal immigrants.
abstract: Mitt Romney is forced to wade gingerly into the debate about the new White House policy governing the deportation of young illegal immigrants as he kicks off a five-day bus tour of small-town America.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney, kicking off a five-day bus tour of small-town America, could not avoid commenting on the new White House policy affecting some young illegal immigrants.

headline.seo: Romney’s New Hampshire Tour Meets the Outside World: Policy on Young Immigrants
headline.main: Romney’s Bus Tour of New Hampshire Lets In a Bit of the Outside World
headline.print_headline: Romney’s Bus Tour of New Hampshire Lets In a Bit of the Outside World
